string-array.name: ticTips
string-array.item: Good players should always draw or win.
House rule #1: a play in the center must block.
In England, the game is called \"Crosses and Naughts\".
Tacks help us pin papers onto the wall.
XOXO can mean \'hugs and kisses\' on love letters.
House rule #2: losing play starts next game.
Variants of the game include Notakto and Treblecross.
